content.rendered:
Digital Display

The digital displays located on each of the three floors of the Campus Center can be used to advertise your events, promote your student organization, and create excitement about activities. For special events, an entire screen can display a PowerPoint presentation to showcase your event.

Please contact Veronica Ashcroft at vashcroft@laverne.edu to request a digital display posting.
